pr_title: [1404] Fixed NPE when executing eth_estimateGas with privacy enabled.

timeline.message:
[1404] Fixed NPE when executing eth_estimateGas with privacy enabled.

Signed-off-by: Mark Terry <mark.terry@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText:
I don't like the "is likely" :-) We should know!
Is that correct? :  "If there's no PrivateMetadataUpdater, that means that the precompile has not been called through the PrivacyBlockProcessor. That means that the precompile has been called because a PMT is being simulated. The execution of the precompile has no influence on the outcome of that simulation."
timeline.author: pinges
pinges
